    • Method Detail

      • fakeFirstName

        public static java.lang.String fakeFirstName(java.lang.String gender,
                                             java.lang.String language,
                                             Person person)
        Generate a first name appropriate for a given gender and language. If `generate.append_numbers_to_person_names` == true, then numbers will be appended automatically.
        Parameters:
        gender - Gender of the name, "M" or "F"
        language - Origin language of the name, "english", "spanish"
        person - person to generate a name for.
        Returns:
        First name.

      • fakeLastName

        public static java.lang.String fakeLastName(java.lang.String language,
                                            Person person)
        Generate a surname appropriate for a given language. If `generate.append_numbers_to_person_names` == true, then numbers will be appended automatically.
        Parameters:
        language - Origin language of the name, "english", "spanish"
        person - person to generate a name for.
        Returns:
        Surname or Family Name.

      • fakeAddress

        public static java.lang.String fakeAddress(boolean includeLine2,
                                           Person person)
        Generate a Street Address.
        Parameters:
        includeLine2 - Whether or not the address should have a second line, which can take the form of an apartment, unit, or suite number.
        person - person to generate an address for.
        Returns:
        First name.

      • addHash

        public static java.lang.String addHash(java.lang.String name)
        Adds a 1- to 3-digit hashcode to the end of the name.
        Parameters:
        name - Person's name
        Returns:
        The name with a hash appended, ex "John123" or "Smith22"
